A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pros:
Great ideas and some truly breathtaking moments
Great direction by RJ
Humorous 
Poe Dameron & BB8
Kylo Ren
Kylo - Luke dynamic

Cons: 
Some really bad ideas
No sense of adventure
Sterile like TFA
No Star Wars charm
Rose & Finn complete waste of screen time
Nonexistent plot progression
Terrible CGI at times
Typical Disney crap - everyone is a diamond in the rough and special
No impactful revelations
Brought nothing new to the table
30 min too long
Few scenes cringe-worthy

Verdict: Really entertaining with some great if not amazing moments. However\, Star Wars as we know it is dead and soon enough everyone will cry for George Lucas to come back. I feel sorry for the young generations. They deserve better. Gone is the magic and the vast world building. All the build up by TFA was never answered and the pay-off is more than underwhelming. After watching TFA I wanted to see more\, I was curious\, I needed answers. Walking out of this movie I felt depressed. To top all off\, this new trilogy destroyed the old trilogy characters to the point of no return\, such a shame. Comparing this movie to the greatness of Empire Strikes Back is a sin. Not looking forward to Episode 9\, in fact I really don't care. As far as I'm concerned\, Episode 1-6 are canon\, this is not.
